I Am Oguzhan The

I specialize in Frontend Development, Web Development

View My Work

I Specialize In

As a front-end developer, I build the front-end of websites and web applications where users see and interact.

Reusable Codes

I build reusable code with React.js because I prefer using JSX syntax and creating functional components such as Header.jsx, Footer.jsx, and Aside.jsx.

User Interfaces

I develop user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I usually add media queries and use CSS frameworks like Bootstrap, Tailwind, and Bulma to create responsive web designs.

Interactive Elements

I add features such as buttons, drop-down menus, and forms to make websites more interactive and more fun.

Follow Industry Trends

I consistently stay updated on new technologies and trends in Front End Development, as it is an ever-evolving field. As a developer, staying open to learning and adapting to the latest trends and best practices is crucial.

My Creative Process

All of my front-end projects are based on a practiced formula to achieve the desired result.

1

Gathering Requirements

Understanding the goals and objectives of your project is crucial. Engage with stakeholders to collect detailed requirements, including user preferences, functionality expectations, and any specific design elements. Identify the target audience and platforms to ensure a tailored user experience.

2

Planning

Create a comprehensive project plan outlining tasks, timelines, and resource allocation. Define the technology stack, frameworks, and tools that will be utilized. Establish a development workflow, version control strategy, and collaboration processes. Consider scalability and future updates in your planning.

3

Development of Interface

Based on the approved design, begin the actual development of the front-end interface. Write clean, modular, and well-documented code. Implement responsive design principles to ensure a seamless experience across various devices and screen sizes. Integrate any necessary third-party libraries or APIs during this phase.

4

Testing and Deployment

Thoroughly test the front-end interface to identify and address any bugs or issues. Perform usability testing to ensure the user experience meets expectations. Once testing is successful, deploy the front-end to the production environment. Monitor for any issues post-deployment and implement necessary fixes promptly.
